Name: Butter Chicken
Description: A classic North Indian dish made with tender chunks of chicken cooked in a rich tomato-based sauce with butter and cream.

Name: Palak Paneer
Description: A dish made with spinach and paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a flavorful onion and tomato-based sauce.

Name: Biryani
Description: A popular mixed rice dish made with spices, meat or vegetables, and saffron.

Name: Samosas
Description: A fried or baked pastry filled with spiced vegetables or meat.

Name: Dosa
Description: A South Indian dish made with a fermented batter of rice and lentils, served with a variety of savory fillings and chutneys.

Name: Vada Pav
Description: A popular street food from Mumbai, consisting of a deep-fried potato dumpling served in a bread roll.

Name: Idli
Description: A South Indian dish made from steamed fermented black lentils and rice.

Name: Naan
Description: A type of leavened bread traditionally cooked in a tandoor (clay oven).

Name: Papadum
Description: A thin, crisp disc-shaped food made from lentil flour, often served as an accompaniment to a meal.

Name: Raita
Description: A popular Indian side dish made of yogurt and various vegetables or fruits.
